answers.answer: No, there is no other reason to have high blood sugar like this except diabetes.I am sure you did not want to hear this, but sounds like your 8 year old is diabetic.  This can be very dangerous (even life threatening) if not treated.  I'd recommend you get your son to his pediatrician immediately and tell the pediatrician what you've just told us.No one wants their child to have diabetes, but the sooner you get this diagnosed and managed the better for everyone.Please don't allow him to drink sugary drinks and eat sweet foods which will make things worse.  But get him to the doctor urgently.Please let us know waht happens wth your son.
Hi, there could be many causes however to check his blood, it should be checked two hours after he has eaten or had anything to drink.Good luck

question: My 8 year old had a blood sugar level of 250 about one hour after consuming a drink with a relatively high level of sugar.  He has recently lost some weight, has thrown up several times, and has experienced nasuea.  Is there any cause for these symptoms other than diabetes?
title: causes for high blood sugar
